description: Provides an overview of Prometheus Performance

targets.expr:
100 *
sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace="monitoring", pod=~"$prometheus", container=~"prometheus", job="kubelet"}[5m])) by (container,pod)
/
sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="monitoring", pod=~"$prometheus", container=~"prometheus", job="kubelet"}[5m])) by (container,pod)
sum by(pod) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="monitoring", pod=~"$prometheus", image!="", job="kubelet", container=~"prometheus", container!="POD"})
sum by(pod) (container_memory_cache{namespace="monitoring", pod=~"$prometheus", image!="", job="kubelet", container=~"prometheus", container!="POD"})

panels.description: All Failures and errors

targets.legendFormat: Failed to reload block data from disk - {{ pod }}

panels.title: Failures and Errors

panels.description: Memory usage for prometheus process, including GO heap and GC
panels.title: Prometheus GOlang Memory Usage

panels.description: Sum of all different failures for Scrapes

targets.expr:
sum by (pod) (prometheus_target_scrapes_exceeded_sample_limit_total{job="prometheus-k8s", pod=~"$prometheus"}) + 
sum by (pod) (prometheus_target_scrapes_sample_duplicate_timestamp_total{job="prometheus-k8s", pod=~"$prometheus"}) + 
sum by (pod) (prometheus_target_scrapes_sample_out_of_bounds_total{job="prometheus-k8s", pod=~"$prometheus"}) + 
sum by (pod) (prometheus_target_scrapes_sample_out_of_order_total{job="prometheus-k8s", pod=~"$prometheus"})
